alert.note: Alert for Grant; Gray; Haskell; Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:41PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Seward, southeastern Grant, northwestern Meade, southwestern Gray and Haskell Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 941 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Satanta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sublette around 955 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tice and Copeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
